Posts.EditableText:
I have had this happen a couple of times. Just today I received two messages from CheeseMyBaby, and after I read the first, then did some stuff. Couple of hours, come back to the web site, no indication I have an unread message, but I went into them as I wanted to reply, and found that other message there, displayed as though I had read it, and I certainly had not.

Anyone else seen this? I am wondering if it is when you get multiple messages from one person?
